sentences.english: CATV signals travel strightyly high up into the space from TV stations.

sentences.english: Yang Hong and accepts the director East on-the-spot coverage in the Nanjing Television station.

sentences.english: Later she went to work for China Central Television Station, presenting two variety shows.
sentences.chinese: 接着她又在中央电视台工作，主持两档综艺节目。
